text: Ponikwa may refer to the following places: *Ponikwa, Lower Silesian Voivodeship — a village in south-west Poland. *Ponikwa, Masovian Voivodeship — a village in east-central Poland. *Ponikwa, West Pomeranian Voivodeship — a village in north-west Poland. *Ponikwa, now spelled Ponykva — a village in West Ukraine.
title: Ponikwa
